content.question: Which of the following is the best explanation for the fragment pattern for individual X ?

choices.label: She has only one member of this chromosome pair.
She has only one living parent.
She is homozygous for this particular DNA fragment.
She is the mother’s child from another marriage.
She is not related to any member of the family being tested.

content.answer: She is the mother’s child from another marriage.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
